thread.title: Verizon Profit Tops Expectations

author: Chelsey Dulaney
title: Verizon Profit Tops Expectations
text:
Verizon Communications Inc. on Tuesday posted a better-than-expected 9.3% jump in profit for its third quarter, as the companyâ€™s 4G smartphone additions improved and growth rebounded in its FiOS business.
Shares, down 4.5% this year, gained 1.5% in premarket trading.
